name: Minimum Slice Count
description: Validates that the acquisition has at least 20 slices for adequate brain coverage.
implementation:
# Validate minimum slice count
n_slices = value["NumberOfSlices"].iloc[0]

if n_slices < 20:
    raise ValidationError(f"Expected at least 20 slices for adequate coverage, found {n_slices}.")

testCases.name: Too few slices
testCases.description: Should fail with fewer than 20 slices
